trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Palmdale
There were no other sightings in Palmdale on or around October 31st 2011
divs: Sighting Detailsits halloween. me and my wife were taking my son out trick or treating around 6:30pm or 6:40pm pacific time usa. we live in palmdale ca. we were talking to our neighbor when she saw 2 lights in the north east that were brighter than normal so they got my attention. 1 was larger than the other 1 looked like the north star but brighter, that was the big one. the small one looked like a star.as i focused on them we noticed they were moving in the same direction slow. they never changed directions. they moved around 3 to 4 minutes then they vanished.we all saw the same thing.
Summary: we seen 2 lights 1 big 1 small north east head east and vanish
